description: This Java class defines the 'Conversation' entity for use with JPA/Hibernate ORM, representing a chatbot conversation stored in the 'chatbot_conversations' database table. It manages conversation metadata such as IDs, language, channel, status, and timestamps.

classes.name: Conversation
classes.description: Entity class representing a chatbot conversation, mapped to the 'chatbot_conversations' table, including metadata about the conversation, timestamps, and related identifiers.

methods.name: prePersist
methods.description: Initializes UUID and timestamps before persisting the entity to the database.
